section.heading: Establishment of the Office of Local Business Development.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see § 221 of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).

annoGroup.heading: Mayor's Orders
annoGroup.annotation: Establishment—Task Force on the Impact of the Terrorist Attacks on District Small Business, see Mayor’s Order 2001-150, October 3, 2001 ( 48 DCR 9529).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 13-38, Title II, § 227, provided: “Sec. 227. Applicability. This title shall apply as of October 1, 1999.”
